error_message: Could NOT find Iconv (missing: Iconv_LIBRARY Iconv_INCLUDE_DIR)
description: CMake provides an option LIBXML2_WITH_ICONV to add ICONV support, which is ON by default, but Iconv is not supported in VxWorks.
notes: Ensure the environment variables <WIND_CC_SYSROOT> and <WIND_SDK_HOME> are set before running the command.
